site_name: Telecommunication Site On Roof Of Mercury House
description: Replacement of the existing tri-sector antenna for an upgraded tri-sector antenna (enlarged diameter requirements); associated rooftop telecommunications equipment
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with documents and drawing numbers: EAL027 01, EAL027 02, EAL027 03, EAL027 04, EAL027 05, EAL027 11, EAL027 12, Design and access statement prepared by GVA an Apleona Company dated 08/06/2017
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The approved telecommunications equipment shall be removed from the site when it becomes redundant.

Reason: To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7.8 of the London Plan (2016), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2012).
